alert.note: Alert for Ness; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 21 at 7:32PM CDT until April 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL NESS AND SOUTHWESTERN RUSH COUNTIES... At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alexander, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Alexander around 735 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Nekoma, McCracken, Hargrave and La Crosse. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central, central and west central Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
